程序包 io.github.dddplus.specification

Specification pattern support：归约模式.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    ISpecification<T extends IDomainModel>
    Specification declaration，是一种显式的业务规则，一种业务约束条件.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Notification
    A notification is an object that collects reason why specifications not satisfied.

程序包io.github.dddplus.specification的说明

Specification pattern support：归约模式.

Explicit business rules.

See Specification pattern wiki for details.
